content: Just landed back in NYC. Japan's left an imprint on my heart, and now I'm buzzing with ideas for that cultural exchange event. Time to blend the East with the West!
raw_content: Just landed back in NYC, and it feels like a lifetime has passed since I left. Japan's left an imprint on my heart, and now I'm buzzing with ideas for that cultural exchange event. Time to blend the East with the West! #NYC #JapanInspired
